member.name: MetafileFrameUnit
member.summary: The MetafileFrameUnit enumeration specifies the unit of measure for a metafile frame rectangle.

member.name: MetafileFrameUnit.MetafileFrameUnitPixel
member.summary: Specifies that a unit is 1 pixel.

member.name: MetafileFrameUnit.MetafileFrameUnitPoint
member.summary: Specifies that a unit is 1 point.

member.name: MetafileFrameUnit.MetafileFrameUnitInch
member.summary: Specifies that a unit is 1 inch.

member.name: MetafileFrameUnit.MetafileFrameUnitDocument
member.summary: Specifies that a unit is 1/300 inch.

member.name: MetafileFrameUnit.MetafileFrameUnitMillimeter
member.summary: Specifies that a unit is 1 millimeter.

member.name: MetafileFrameUnit.MetafileFrameUnitGdi
member.summary: Specifies that a unit is 0.01 millimeter. This element is provided for compatibility with GDI.
